review: I was somewhat skeptical when I ordered this, I had a hard time believing something at this price would really let us watch Netflix & Hulu + on our TV and still be high quality.I have been very pleasantly surprised.  The picture quality looks just as good as any show or movie we watch on regular DVDs or TV.  It was very easy to set up (took about 5 minutes).  Works for Netflix & Hulu+ so we can watch the majority of TV shows.Extremely low price.  It wouldn't have surprised me at all to see this cost triple what it retails at, and I probably would have bought it even then.Occasionally has issues where the sync isn't quite working but turning off the app and restarting it fixed that issue.My only complaint is it doesn't really work with anything else beyond Netflix & Hulu+.  My wife has a number of tv station apps (like Lifetime and ABC) that she likes to watch to catch up on shows.  Occasionally there will be shows on those apps that are not on Hulu+ or Netflix so she will be unable to watch them on the TV (we are ditching our higher tv package).
author: Kyle Shanahan
